content.question: Which of the following correctly lists the four major ancient culture hearths?

choices.label: Central Asia, India, Nile Valley, Southern Europe
Egypt, Mekong Valley, Middle East, Western Africa
Indus Valley, Mesopotamia, Nile Valley, North China

content.answer: Indus Valley, Mesopotamia, Nile Valley, North China
